entries.title: Wikipedia throttle window adjustment
entries.description: Extended throttle to 450 req/min between 02:00-04:00 UTC per Wikimedia policy update. This affects file download connection times but improves long-term API stability.

_impact.mitigation: Scheduled runs avoid 02:00-04:00 UTC window when possible

entries.title: Spr√•kbanken encoding monitoring
entries.description: Monitoring UTF-8 encoding consistency after Oct 29 corpus update. Early indicators show no regressions, but tracking langid_filter performance for next 2 weeks.

_impact.mitigation: Automated quality checks running on each pipeline execution

entries.title: TikTok API rate limit increase
entries.description: TikTok API increased rate limits from 100 to 150 requests/min effective Oct 20. Updated Apify actor configuration to take advantage of higher throughput.

_impact.mitigation: Monitoring for stability before scaling to maximum rate

entries.title: BBC network anomaly investigation
entries.description: Oct 25 run showed 61% duration increase for BBC source. Root cause identified as transient network routing issue at ISP level. Issue resolved, no action needed.

_impact.mitigation: No recurrence in 5 subsequent runs, monitoring ongoing

entries.title: HuggingFace dataset version update
entries.description: c4-so dataset updated to v1.2 on Oct 18. New version includes improved language tagging but same content volume. Quality pass rate improved from 94% to 95%.

_impact.mitigation: Baseline updated to reflect new quality expectations

entries.title: Global quality filter tuning recommendation
entries.description: Analysis of 15-run sample suggests min_length_filter could be relaxed from 100 to 75 characters for Wikipedia without significant quality degradation. This would improve yield by approximately 8-10%.

_observation_lifecycle_states.active: Operational change in effect, ongoing monitoring required
_observation_lifecycle_states.monitoring: Change implemented, observing for stability or side effects
_observation_lifecycle_states.resolved: Issue investigated and closed, no further action required
